name: Vibrant
description: Hotline Miami meets abstraction. Vibrant brings you "in the zone" through hyper-focus. Your last freedom is movement.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 XP / Vista / 7 Processor: 1.7 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: OpenGL 2.0+
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 XP / Vista / 7 Processor: 1.7 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: OpenGL 2.0+
